description: Try our easy to follow Chicken, Pesto & Bacon Pan-fry recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Chicken, Pesto & Bacon Panfry Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Make a slit in each chicken breast along its length. Open and fill with the pesto. Stretch each bacon rasher with the back of a sharp knife to lengthen, then wrap tightly around the chicken breast to enclose the pesto filling.
Heat the oil in a large heavybased frying pan and cook the chicken breasts over a medium-high heat for 10-12 minutes until golden and cooked through.
Serve the chicken with green beans and baby potatoes, if liked.
